sentences.sContent: The UN deplored the invasion as a ‘violation of international law’.
sentences.sCn: 联合国谴责这次入侵 “违反了国际法” 。

synos.tran: 谴责；悲悼；哀叹；对…深感遗憾

remMethod.val: de(变坏)+plore(流出)→流露出伤心的情绪→悲悼， 哀叹

trans.tranOther: to disapprove of something very strongly and criticize it severely, especially publicly
